mapper.select: select * from b2board order by b2_number desc
mapper.insert: insert into b2board (b2_number, writer, title, content, imageurl1, imageurl2, imageurl3, b_like, b_dislike, time) values (b2board_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, 0, 0, sysdate)
mapper.update: update b2board set b_like=b_like+1 where b2_number = #{param4}
update b2board set b_dislike=b_dislike+1 where b2_number = #{param4}
update b2board set b_like=b_like-1 where b2_number = #{param4}
update b2board set b_dislike=b_dislike-1 where b2_number = #{param4}
